attributes.action: ASK THE PEOPLE IF DAVID CAMERON SHOULD BE 'EMPTY CHAIRED' AT ANY LEADERS DEBATE.
attributes.additional_details: David  Cameron is such a non-entity in UK politics that his presence, or not, is irrelevant.  If he has any balls he will put it to the electorate whether he should attend or be empty chaired.  In my view his contribution will be the same, whether he is there or if he is not there, TOTALLY IRRELEVANTLY and this is because NOBODY with a brain in this country CAN believe anything which comes out if his mouth.
